betterbound.description: Developing a productivity improvement SaaS for planning teams. Responsible for design, development, and maintenance of a task management tool promoting 'team visualization'.
responsibilities: System design and development of task management tool
Extended development of Gantt chart functionality
achievements: Created a platform for planning teams to register deliverables
Implemented mention feature enabling notifications to specific users
Forked and extended React-Gantt library to customize data displayed on Gantt charts

famitra.description: Working at a company promoting Family Trust DX, developing internal consultant management systems and customer-facing applications. Responsible for requirements definition, system design, development, and maintenance.
responsibilities: Development of internal consultant management system (family tree, asset information, proposal output)
Design and development of trust contract guide app
Design and development of ledger submission app
Requirements definition, system design, testing, and maintenance
achievements: Implemented automatic proposal generation using Google Slides API
Implemented LINE notifications using Social PLUS API
Implemented feature to view LINE and Gmail communications with customers on the management screen
Implemented receipt image preview display using AWS S3 Ã— ActiveStorage
Implemented account and transaction history display using Moneytree LINK SDK
